EmailTemplate.name: PS GSL1 PRM-Request Add Email Domain in NAM
EmailTemplate.subject: PRM-Request Add Email Domain in NAM : {!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.PS_Escalated_To_Name__c},
Please process the following Partner-related request based on the details below:
PRM-Request to Add Email Domain in NAM
Organization Name
ALCR ID / 1*
SAP ID / 2*
Account ID / 3*
Partner Company Email Domains
Additional Notes
Once completed, please revert with the confirmation.
If additional information is needed, please don't hesitate to reach out to us at partner.support@nokia.com.
Regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} Partner Support Desk Email: partner.support@nokia.com
Partner Portal
Copyright 2020 Nokia
Thread Id: {{!Case.Thread_Id}}
